abstract: Recall effort against Ferguson, Mo, Mayor James Knowles III fails to gain enough support.
lead_paragraph: An effort to recall the mayor of Ferguson, Mo., in the wake of last summer’s shooting death of Michael Brown has fallen short.

headline.main: Missouri: Recall Effort Against Ferguson Mayor Fails
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Recall Effort Against Ferguson Mayor Fails

snippet: An effort to recall the mayor of Ferguson, Mo., in the wake of last summer’s shooting death of Michael Brown has fallen short.
